title: Deadlock as Bristol City Council fails to approve budget
description: Bristol City Council has failed to approve its budget for the next financial year. Councillors voted against the plans during a full council meeting at City Hall which lasted about three hours. Outgoing Labour mayor Marvin Rees's final budget proposed more than £24m of cutbacks and a 4.99% council tax hike.
